what_you_do: Martha Alexander is a coach who helps others live life fully aligned with their deepest commitments and attend to the health of their mind, body, and spirit.
who_you_serve: Those who aspire to live their best life, grow into their purpose, maximize their potential, and flourish.
business_focus: Helping individuals live their best life through coaching, workshops, and products.
